short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for sharing anonymized news browsing data for academic purposes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IUMS stands for Inter University Media Study
The purpose of this app is to gather anonymized data from consenting study participants in order to analyze media consumption habits.
